channel.title: Talks of Swami Chidananda Puri
channel.description:
A podcast created using https://github.com/vedavaapi/scala-akka-http-server from the archive item: https://archive.org/details/swAmi-chidAnanda-purI, with description: Collection of some talks in audio format by Pujya Swami Chidananda Puri from YouTube and other sources. For originals search in YouTube or visit their website http://advaithashramam.org/ or FaceBook page: https://www.facebook.com/chidanandapuri/.

പൂജ്യ സ്വാമി ചിദാനന്ദപുരികളുടെ ഭാഷണങ്ങൾ.
.
